|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A64; |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1spd = 1.1 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Artmem;ATL3A1632-H12A; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, eMMC Module socket |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.35 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, via EXP header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Audio in/out (3.5mm), HDMI, SPDIF, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, RTC, I2S, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, Li-ion battery connector |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP803;;1;,,, 1.2MHz 2A Step Up Converter;Aerosemi;MT3608;;1;,,, 300mA Dual-Channel Ultra Low Drop-out Voltage Regulator;TI;LP3986;;1;,,, White LED 3A Current Limit Step-up Converter;Silicon Standard;SS6635;;1;,,, 1.5A Power Switch w/ Progr. Current Limit;LowPower Semi;LPW5210;;2;,,, 30V 1A High Performance Boost Converter;LowPower Semi;LP3315;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0524P;;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Pine64 P64-WiFi/BT |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723BS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Designed in Silicon Valley, California. Built in Silicon Delta, China." :is silkscreened on back of board. "SOPine Baseboard Model A Rev B" and "2017-02-07" is silkscreened on board.
*Carrier board for [[Pine64 SOPine-A64]] SoM
{{See also|Pine64|Allwinner}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A64 @1.152GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Storage: eMMC Flash Module socket, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE LAN port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel :or 3.7V lithium-ion battery
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/SOPINE_Baseboard Documentation] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/01/17/pine64-introduces-sopine-a64-allwinner-a64-som-and-sopine-model-a-baseboard/ ''PINE64 Introduces SOPINE A64 Allwinner A64 SoM'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-29-com-shrinks-pine-a64-to-sodimm-dimensions-2/ ''Open spec, $29 COM shrinks Pine A64 to SODIMM dimensions'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/pine64/pine64_sopine_a64 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa53 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
